HeaderSection.title: Internxt vs Google Meet overview
HeaderSection.description: Discover the key features and differences that allow Internxt to give you back control over your data.

internxtFeatures: Competitive, no hidden costs, up to 5TB
Drive, VPN, Antivirus, Cleaner, Meet, Mail, and more
Can never access your videos or chats
Full privacy: GDPR, Spanish Data Protection Laws
competitorFeatures: Drive, Google Workspace, AI integration, Mail, and Meet
Can access videos and chats under certain circumstances
Less privacy: EU-U.S. Data Privacy Framework

PrivacyViolationsSection.title: Google pays fines for data privacy violations. Internxt protects your privacy.
PrivacyViolationsSection.description: Google may be secure, but it’s a nightmare for your privacy. Switch to Internxt for full security for your video calls, cloud storage, and online privacy needs.

descriptions: €10 million: The Spanish data protection authority fined Google for violating GDPR by passing on identifying information of people who requested deletion to third parties without consent.
€325 million: In 2025, France’s CNIL fined Google for displaying advertisements between Gmail users' emails and for placing cookies without valid consent.
€7 million: The Swedish Data Protection Authority imposed a fine on Google for failing to remove search results that people requested to be deleted, exposing their identities.
€90 million: France’s CNIL fined Google for making it harder for users to refuse cookies, a practice that supported their tracking-based revenue model.

WhyNeedAlternativeSection.title: Why you need a private Google Meet alternative
WhyNeedAlternativeSection.description: What Google demonstrates in security fails in terms of privacy. For full privacy, get total security combined with zero-knowledge encryption.

descriptions: Google Meet links metadata, who you meet with, and for how long. Internxt has no trackers, no AI scanning, and no hidden backdoors.
Google manages encryption keys on its servers, giving it total control. Internxt uses zero-knowledge encryption so only you can access your data.
With Google, your activities are monitored to build a profile and profit. With Internxt, you are the owner, not the product.

VersusSection.title: Internxt vs Google Meet
VersusSection.description: Internxt offers unparalleled security with features that Google Meet can’t match, such as post-quantum encryption.

inxtTable.title: Internxt: Total privacy, transparency, and trust

features.title: Open source
features.description: Internxt's code is open for everyone to examine via GitHub. This transparency guarantees that no vulnerabilities are hidden.

features.title: Zero-knowledge Encryption
features.description: Your data is encrypted on the client side, guaranteeing that only you can access it.

features.title: Audited & compliant
features.description: Internxt has been externally audited and complies with GDPR, HIPAA, ISO 27001, and SOC 2.

features.title: Lifetime plans
features.description: Avoid repeated subscriptions with a one-time payment for plans up to 5TB. Access our services forever for {{discount}}% off.

competitorTable.title: Google Meet: What about your privacy?

features.title: Proprietary software
features.description: Google keeps its source code hidden. There is no way to know for sure how they handle or protect your data.

features.title: Encrypted by Google
features.description: Google holds the encryption keys and can theoretically decrypt and access your meetings if they receive a legal request.

features.title: Compliance fines
features.description: Google has a record of regulatory fines for failing to protect customer data and violating user consent.

features.title: Subscription based
features.description: Only offers monthly or annual subscriptions with limited storage compared to Internxt's flexible options.

WhyBestAlternativeSection.title: Why Internxt is the best Google Meet alternative
WhyBestAlternativeSection.description: Internxt Drive offers a comprehensive suite of products designed to give you back control of your online privacy.

descriptions: Internxt Antivirus is built directly into your app for full protection against malware, ransomware, and spyware.
Internxt’s VPN protects your browsing, blocks ads and trackers, and keeps your location private while preventing identity theft.
Internxt Cleaner helps you identify and eliminate unwanted junk or duplicate files to keep your device running efficiently.
Internxt Meet is your secure alternative to Google Meet. Host private video calls protected with post-quantum encryption and free from trackers.
Available on Windows, Mac, Linux, and mobile. For advanced users, we offer support for WebDAV, Rclone, and NAS.

CtaSection.title: DeGoogle your life with Internxt
CtaSection.description: Total privacy for your video calls

freePlanCard.description: Get 1GB of encrypted cloud storage for free

faq.question: Is Internxt a more secure and private Google Meet alternative?
answer: Yes, Internxt uses post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption that guarantees nobody but you can view your files.
Google manages keys on its own servers for Drive, Gmail, and Meet, meaning they could access your files or give access to authorities.

faq.question: What is post-quantum encryption, and is it more secure?
answer: Unlike standard encryption, post-quantum encryption algorithms are built to resist powerful quantum attacks, making PQE a more secure alternative.
This method ensures that your lifetime cloud storage plan protects you against future cybersecurity threats at no extra cost.

faq.question: Where is Internxt based?
answer: Internxt is based in Valencia, Spain, making it a GDPR compliant cloud storage solution that follows strict EU privacy laws.

faq.question: Is Google Meet more expensive than Internxt?
answer: Google Meet has a free version, but for professional storage and features, Internxt is more cost-effective thanks to our {{percentage}}% discount and lifetime plans.

faq.question: How do I contact support?
answer: If you have any more questions, requests, or need assistance, you can contact hello@internxt.com and our Customer Success Team will be happy to help.

faq.question: Can I add more storage to my lifetime plan?
answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan from the settings of your Internxt account or purchase a new plan to stack your storage automatically.

faq.question: Can I pay with credit card, PayPal, or cryptocurrency?
answer: Internxt currently accepts debit and credit cards (Mastercard, VISA, etc), PayPal, iDEAL, Sofort, Cryptocurrency, and Klarna.
